scripts.preinstall: node -e "if (process.env.npm_execpath && !process.env.npm_execpath.includes('pnpm')) { console.error('\u001b[31m‚ùå Please use pnpm instead of npm/yarn\u001b[0m'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.size: pnpm build && echo '\nüì¶ Bundle Size:' && du -sh dist && echo '\nüìä File Breakdown:' && find dist -name '*.js' -o -name '*.css' | xargs du -h | sort -h
scripts.size:detail: pnpm build && echo '\nüì¶ Total Size:' && du -sh dist && echo '\nüìä All Files:' && du -ah dist | sort -h
scripts.size:check: pnpm build && size=$(find dist -type f -exec stat -f%z {} + | awk '{s+=$1} END {print s}') && if [ "$size" -gt 102400 ]; then echo "‚ùå Build size ($size bytes) exceeds 100KB limit!"; exit 1; else echo "‚úÖ Build size ($size bytes) is within 100KB limit"; fi
scripts.test:perf:debug: pnpm build && pnpm preview & sleep 10 && curl -f http://localhost:4173/ && lhci autorun
scripts.test:perf:simple:
pnpm build && echo 'Test

Hello World

' > dist/test.html && pnpm preview & sleep 5 && lhci autorun --url http://localhost:4173/test.html
scripts.deploy: pnpm build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name virtual-tabletop
scripts.deploy:staging: pnpm build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name virtual-tabletop-staging
scripts.preview:deploy: pnpm build && wrangler pages deploy dist --project-name virtual-tabletop-preview
